Name: Medium Melee Weapon Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Medium melee weapons without penalty.

Name: Heavy Melee Weapon Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Heavy melee weapons.

Name: Light Bow Proficiency
Description: You can effectively wield Light Bows, Slingshots and Crossbows.

Name: Medium Armor Training
Description: You can equip Medium armor. While wearing it, gain +1 Athletics.

Name: Mana Recovery
Description: During a Short Rest, you can recover 1 expended Mana point. This can only be done once per Long Rest.

Name: Heavy Armor Training
Description: You can equip Heavy armor. While wearing it, gain +1 Athletics and +1 Brawn.

Name: Arcane Initiate
Description: You gain the ability to cast Cantrips. You also gain 1 Mana point and may learn two Level 1 Arcane spells.

Name: Adrenaline Surge
Description: Once per rest (twice at Level 6), you can take an additional Action on your turn. Using this trait causes 1 Exhaustion.

Name: Scholarship
Description: You gain +1 to Scholarship checks and can learn 1 additional spell per level.
